name: A FLAT MAP
description:
Welcome to A FLAT MAP! (BETA 0.1P)

You are this little blue Ico Sphere and your goal is to get the highest possible score! But with a little "twist"... (Hold space)..

You should avoid the red Ico Spheres but go ahead and collect as many POLYS as you can! (Golden Ico Spheres) OR team up with your friend and try to get as far as possible in the local co-op mode! 

The game is not finished yet and that's why it's still in development. 

In future there will more levels, maybe a complete story, different characters with different powerups and hopefully much MORE!

This is just a simple game that I'm making on my spare time. So don't expect too much...

(Sorry for my English)
